articles.title: U.S. & European stock futures rise, oil bounces - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. and European stocks futures moved higher on Monday as Asian markets lagged, while bonds surrendered some of their recent gains and oil rallied as Saudi Arabia lifted its crude prices.

articles.title: 'Chinese power blunted in Asia' as Australia defies trade sanctions - 9News
articles.description: The Biden Administration has clawed back US influence in Asia, while domestic troubles have blunted China's regional ascendancy, according to an Australian think-tank.

articles.title: China Evergrande Debt Restructuring Looms - Bloomberg Markets and Finance
articles.description: The long-awaited debt restructuring of embattled developer China Evergrande Group may finally be at hand. Stephen Engle reports on "Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia."
